mapper.select: select RESULTFATE_ID resultFateId, USER_NAME userName, MAXFIVE maxFive, TREE tree, FIRE fire, SOIL soil, STEEL steel, WATER water, TOTAL total, LOVE love, MONEY money, HEALTH health, JOB job from resultfate where RESULTFATE_ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into inputfate(USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, USER_TIME, USER_GENDER) VALUES(#{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userTime}, #{userGender})

INSERT INTO resultfate(USER_NAME, MAXFIVE, TREE, FIRE, SOIL, STEEL, WATER, TOTAL, LOVE, MONEY, HEALTH, JOB, RESULT_TYPE) VALUES(#{userName}, #{maxFive}, #{tree}, #{fire}, #{soil}, #{steel}, #{water}, #{total}, #{love}, #{money}, #{health}, #{job}, 1)
